trans-unit.source: A “point” is a unit of measurement equal to 1/72 inch. A scaling factor of 1.0 corresponds to 1 pixel per point, which is equivalent to a standard 72 dpi monitor. A scaling factor of 1.25 would mean 1.25 pixels per point, which is the setting for a 90 dpi monitor; setting the scaling factor to 1.25 on a 72 dpi monitor would cause everything in the application to be displayed 1.25 times as large as normal. The initial value for the scaling factor is set when the application starts, based on properties of the installed monitor, but it can be changed at any time. Measurements made after the scaling factor is changed will use the new scaling factor, but it is undefined whether existing widgets will resize themselves dynamically to accommodate the new scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: “点”是等于1/72英寸的度量单位。比例因子1.0对应于每个点1个像素，相当于标准的72 dpi监视器。比例因子1.25表示每点1.25像素，这是90 dpi显示器的设置；在72 dpi监视器上将缩放因子设置为1.25，将导致应用程序中的所有内容显示为正常值的1.25倍。比例因子的初始值是在应用程序启动时根据安装的监视器的属性设置的，但可以随时更改。更改比例因子后进行的测量将使用新的比例因子，但是尚不确定现有小部件是否会动态调整自身大小以适应新的比例因子。

trans-unit.source: A Circulate event indicates that the window has moved to the top or to the bottom of the stacking order as a result of an XCirculateSubwindows protocol request. Note that the stacking order may be changed for other reasons which do not generate a Circulate event, and that Tk does not use XCirculateSubwindows() internally. This event type is included only for completeness; there is no reliable way to track changes to a window's position in the stacking order.
trans-unit.target: 甲传阅事件表示窗口已经移动到顶部或层叠顺序作为结果的底部XCirculateSubwindows协议请求。请注意，可能会由于其他原因而更改堆叠顺序，而这些其他原因不会生成Circulate事件，并且Tk在内部未使用XCirculateSubwindows（）。仅出于完整性考虑而包含此事件类型。没有可靠的方法来跟踪堆栈顺序中窗口位置的变化。

trans-unit.source: A Colormap event is generated whenever the colormap associated with a window has been changed, installed, or uninstalled.

trans-unit.source: A Configure event is sent to a window whenever its size, position, or border width changes, and sometimes when it has changed position in the stacking order.

trans-unit.source: A Destroy event is delivered to a window when it is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 销毁事件将销毁事件发送到窗口。

trans-unit.source: A Property event is sent to a window whenever an X property belonging to that window is changed or deleted. Property events are not normally delivered to Tk applications as they are handled by the Tk core.

If a spinbox is exporting its selection (see the -exportselection option), then it will observe the standard protocols for handling the selection; spinbox selections are available as type STRING. trans-unit.target: 甲TTK ::按钮按下时小部件显示一个文本标签和/或图像，并且评估的命令。

trans-unit.source: A ttk::checkbutton widget is used to show or change a setting. It has two states, selected and deselected. The state of the checkbutton may be linked to a Tcl variable.

trans-unit.source: A ttk::frame widget is a container, used to group other widgets together.
trans-unit.target: 甲TTK ::框架部件是一种容器，用于将其他部件一起。

trans-unit.target: 甲TTK :: labelframe小部件用于组其他部件一起的容器。它具有可选标签，可以是纯文本字符串或其他小部件。

trans-unit.source: A ttk::menubutton widget displays a textual label and/or image, and displays a menu when pressed.

trans-unit.target: 甲TTK ::隔板插件显示器的水平或垂直分隔条。

trans-unit.source: A ttk::spinbox widget is a ttk::entry widget with built-in up and down buttons that are used to either modify a numeric value or to select among a set of values. The widget implements all the features of the ttk::entry widget including support of the -textvariable option to link the value displayed by the widget to a Tcl variable.
trans-unit.target: 一个TTK ::纺纱器 Widget是一个TTK ::进入小部件内置上下了用于要么修改数值或一组值中选择按钮。该小部件实现了ttk :: entry小部件的所有功能，包括-textvariable选项的支持，该选项可将小部件显示的值链接到Tcl变量。

trans-unit.source: A BREAK condition has been detected by your UART (see above).
trans-unit.target: 您的UART检测到一个BREAK状态(见上文)。

trans-unit.source: A BREAK condition is not a hardware signal line, but a logical zero on the TXD or RXD lines for a long period of time, usually 250 to 500 milliseconds. Normally a receive or transmit data signal stays at the mark (on=1) voltage until the next character is transferred. A BREAK is sometimes used to reset the communications line or change the operating mode of communications hardware.
trans-unit.target: BREAK条件不是硬件信号线,而是在TXD或RXD线上长时间的逻辑零点,通常是250到500毫秒。通常接收或发送数据信号会停留在标记(on=1)电压上,直到传输下一个字符。BREAK有时用于重置通信线路或改变通信硬件的工作模式。

trans-unit.source: A Tcl expression consists of a combination of operands, operators, parentheses and commas. White space may be used between the operands and operators and parentheses (or commas); it is ignored by the expression's instructions. Where possible, operands are interpreted as integer values. Integer values may be specified in decimal (the normal case), in binary (if the first two characters of the operand are 0b), in octal (if the first two characters of the operand are 0o), or in hexadecimal (if the first two characters of the operand are 0x). For compatibility with older Tcl releases, an octal integer value is also indicated simply when the first character of the operand is 0, whether or not the second character is also o. If an operand does not have one of the integer formats given above, then it is treated as a floating-point number if that is possible. Floating-point numbers may be specified in any of several common formats making use of the decimal digits, the decimal point ., the characters e or E indicating scientific notation, and the sign characters + or -. For example, all of the following are valid floating-point numbers: 2.1, 3., 6e4, 7.91e+16. Also recognized as floating point values are the strings Inf and NaN making use of any case for each character. If no numeric interpretation is possible (note that all literal operands that are not numeric or boolean must be quoted with either braces or with double quotes), then an operand is left as a string (and only a limited set of operators may be applied to it).
trans-unit.target: Tcl表达式由操作数，运算符，括号和逗号组成。在操作数与运算符和括号（或逗号）之间可以使用空格。表达式的说明将忽略它。在可能的情况下，将操作数解释为整数值。整数值可以十进制（通常情况下），二进制（如果操作数的前两个字符为0b），八进制（如果操作数的前两个字符为0o）或十六进制（如果第一个操作数的两个字符为0x）。为了与较早的Tcl版本兼容，当操作数的第一个字符为0时，无论第二个字符是否也是o，也仅指示八进制整数值。如果操作数不具有上面给出的整数格式之一，则在可能的情况下将其视为浮点数。浮点数可以使用十进制数字（十进制点）以几种常见格式中的任何一种来指定。，表示科学计数法的字符e或E以及符号+或-。例如，以下所有都是有效的浮点数：2.1、3、6e4、7.91e + 16。字符串Inf和NaN也被认为是浮点值每个字符都使用大小写。如果无法进行数字解释（请注意，所有非数字或布尔值的文字操作数都必须用大括号或双引号引起来），则操作数将作为字符串保留（并且只能将一组有限的运算符应用于它）。

trans-unit.source: A Tcl interpreter always has a service name of TclEval. Each different interpreter of all running Tcl applications must be given a unique name specified by dde servername. Each interp is available as a DDE topic only if the dde servername command was used to set the name of the topic for each interp. So a dde services TclEval {} command will return a list of service-topic pairs, where each of the currently running interps will be a topic.
trans-unit.target: Tcl解释器的服务名称始终为TclEval。必须为所有正在运行的Tcl应用程序的每个不同的解释器指定一个唯一的名称，该名称由dde servername指定。仅当使用dde servername命令为每个插值设置主题名称时，每个插值才可用作DDE主题。因此，dde services TclEval {}命令将返回一个服务主题对列表，其中每个当前运行的插值将是一个主题。

trans-unit.source: A Tcl script is a string containing one or more commands. Semi-colons and newlines are command separators unless quoted as described below. Close brackets are command terminators during command substitution (see below) unless quoted.
trans-unit.target: Tcl脚本是一个包含一个或多个命令的字符串。分号和换行符是命令的分隔符,除非按下面的说明加以引用。除非加了引号,否则在命令替换过程中,圆括号是命令结束符(见下文)。

trans-unit.source: A Tcl script prefix to evaluate to change the view in the widget associated with the scrollbar. Additional arguments are appended to the value of this option, as described in SCROLLING COMMANDS below, whenever the user requests a view change by manipulating the scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: Tcl脚本前缀，用于评估以更改与滚动条关联的小部件中的视图。每当用户通过操纵滚动条请求更改视图时，其他参数就会附加到此选项的值，如下面的“滚动命令”中所述。

trans-unit.source: A Tcl script to evaluate immediately before displaying the listbox. The -postcommand script may specify the -values to display.
trans-unit.target: 一个Tcl脚本，用于在显示列表框之前立即进行评估。该-postcommand脚本可以指定-值来显示。

trans-unit.source: A Tcl script to evaluate whenever the widget is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 一个Tcl脚本,当小组件被调用时,它将被评估。

trans-unit.source: A Tcl script to execute whenever the widget is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 每当小组件被调用时执行的 Tcl 脚本。

trans-unit.source: A Tk image, displayed to the left of the label.
trans-unit.target: 一个Tk图像,显示在标签的左边。

trans-unit.source: A Unix-centric font name of the form
trans-unit.target: 一个以Unix为中心的字体名称,其形式为

trans-unit.source: A back reference (AREs only) matches the same string matched by the parenthesized subexpression specified by the number, so that (e.g.) “([bc])\1” matches “bb” or “cc” but not “bc”. The subexpression must entirely precede the back reference in the RE. Subexpressions are numbered in the order of their leading parentheses. Non-capturing parentheses do not define subexpressions.
trans-unit.target: 反向引用（仅适用于ARE）与由数字指定的带括号的子表达式匹配的相同字符串匹配，因此（例如）“ （[[bc]）\ 1 ”与“ bb ”或“ cc ” 匹配，而不与“ bc ” 匹配。子表达式必须完全在RE中的反向引用之前。子表达式按其前导括号的顺序编号。非捕获括号不定义子表达式。

trans-unit.source: A background error is one that occurs in an event handler or some other command that did not originate with the application. For example, if an error occurs while executing a command specified with the after command, then it is a background error. For a non-background error, the error can simply be returned up through nested Tcl command evaluations until it reaches the top-level code in the application; then the application can report the error in whatever way it wishes. When a background error occurs, the unwinding ends in the Tcl library and there is no obvious way for Tcl to report the error.
trans-unit.target: 背景错误是发生在事件处理程序或其他并非源自应用程序的命令中的错误。例如，如果在执行由after命令指定的命令时发生错误，则它是后台错误。对于非背景错误，可以简单地通过嵌套的Tcl命令评估返回错误，直到错误到达应用程序中的顶级代码为止。然后应用程序可以按照其希望的任何方式报告错误。当发生后台错误时，展开将在Tcl库中结束，并且Tcl没有明显的方法来报告错误。

trans-unit.source: A background exception handler consists of a non-empty list of words to which will be appended two further words at invocation time. The first word will be the interpreter result at time of the exception, typically an error message, and the second will be the dictionary of return options at the time of the exception. These are the same values that catch can capture when it controls script evaluation in a non-background situation. The resulting list will then be executed in the interpreter's global namespace without further substitutions being performed.
trans-unit.target: 后台异常处理程序由单词的非空列表组成，将在调用时在其后附加两个单词。第一个单词是异常发生时的解释器结果，通常是错误消息，第二个单词是异常发生时的返回选项字典。这些是在非背景情况下控制脚本评估时catch可以捕获的相同值。然后，将在解释器的全局名称空间中执行结果列表，而无需执行进一步的替换。

A button activates whenever the mouse passes over it and deactivates whenever the mouse leaves the button. Under Windows, this binding is only active when mouse button 1 has been pressed over the button.

trans-unit.source: A button is a widget that displays a textual string, bitmap or image. If text is displayed, it must all be in a single font, but it can occupy multiple lines on the screen (if it contains newlines or if wrapping occurs because of the -wraplength option) and one of the characters may optionally be underlined using the -underline option. It can display itself in either of three different ways, according to the -state option; it can be made to appear raised, sunken, or flat; and it can be made to flash. When a user invokes the button (by pressing mouse button 1 with the cursor over the button), then the Tcl command specified in the -command option is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 按钮是显示文本字符串，位图或图像的小部件。如果显示了文本，则必须全部使用单一字体，但是它可以占据屏幕上的多行（如果包含换行符，或者由于-wraplength选项而导致换行），并且可以选择使用其中一个字符加下划线-下划线选项。根据-state选项，它可以以三种不同方式之一显示自己。可以使其看起来凸起，凹陷或平坦；并可以使其闪烁。当用户调用按钮时（通过将鼠标光标悬停在按钮上按鼠标按钮1），将调用-command选项中指定的Tcl命令。

trans-unit.source: A button's relief is changed to sunken whenever mouse button 1 is pressed over the button, and the relief is restored to its original value when button 1 is later released.
trans-unit.target: 每当鼠标按钮1被按在按钮上时,按钮的浮雕就会变为下沉,而后松开按钮1时,浮雕又恢复到原来的值。

trans-unit.source: A cascade entry is one with an associated menu (determined by the -menu option). Cascade entries allow the construction of cascading menus. The postcascade widget command can be used to post and unpost the associated menu just next to of the cascade entry. The associated menu must be a child of the menu containing the cascade entry (this is needed in order for menu traversal to work correctly).

trans-unit.source: A channel is considered to be readable if there is unread data available on the underlying device. A channel is also considered to be readable if there is unread data in an input buffer, except in the special case where the most recent attempt to read from the channel was a gets call that could not find a complete line in the input buffer. This feature allows a file to be read a line at a time in nonblocking mode using events. A channel is also considered to be readable if an end of file or error condition is present on the underlying file or device. It is important for
trans-unit.target: 如果基础设备上有未读数据，则认为该通道是可读的。如果输入缓冲区中有未读数据，则该通道也被认为是可读的，除非在特殊情况下，最近一次从该通道读取的尝试是一个gets调用，该调用在输入缓冲区中找不到完整的行。此功能允许使用事件在非阻塞模式下一次读取文件。如果基础文件或设备上存在文件结尾或错误情况，则该通道也被认为是可读的。重要的是

This feature allows a file to be read a line at a time in non-blocking mode using events. A channel is also considered to be readable if an end of file or error condition is present on the underlying file or device. It is important for

trans-unit.source: A channel is considered to be writable if at least one byte of data can be written to the underlying file or device without blocking, or if an error condition is present on the underlying file or device.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少一个字节的数据可以在不阻塞的情况下写入底层文件或设备,或者如果底层文件或设备上存在错误条件,则认为一个通道是可写的。

trans-unit.source: A channel is considered to be writable if at least one byte of data can be written to the underlying file or device without blocking, or if an error condition is present on the underlying file or device. Note that client sockets opened in asynchronous mode become writable when they become connected or if the connection fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少有一个字节的数据可以在不阻塞的情况下写入底层文件或设备,或者底层文件或设备上存在错误条件,则认为一个通道是可写的。请注意,在异步模式下打开的客户端套接字,当它们成为连接或连接失败时,就成为可写的。

trans-unit.source: A character producing white space in displayed text.
trans-unit.target: 在显示的文本中产生空白的字符。

trans-unit.source: A character with a visible representation (includes both alnum and punct).
trans-unit.target: 具有可见表示的字符（包括alnum和punct）。

trans-unit.source: A checkbutton is a widget that displays a textual string, bitmap or image and a square called an
trans-unit.target: 复选按钮是一个显示文本字符串、位图或图像的小部件,以及一个称为 "复选按钮 "的方块。

trans-unit.source: A checkbutton menu entry behaves much like a checkbutton widget. When it is invoked it toggles back and forth between the selected and deselected states. When the entry is selected, a particular value is stored in a particular global variable (as determined by the -onvalue and -variable options for the entry); when the entry is deselected another value (determined by the -offvalue option) is stored in the global variable. An indicator box is displayed to the left of the label in a checkbutton entry. If the entry is selected then the indicator's center is displayed in the color given by the -selectcolor option for the entry; otherwise the indicator's center is displayed in the background color for the menu. If a -command option is specified for a checkbutton entry, then its value is evaluated as a Tcl command each time the entry is invoked; this happens after toggling the entry's selected state.
trans-unit.target: 复选按钮菜单项的行为非常类似于复选按钮小部件。调用它时，它会在选定状态和取消选定状态之间来回切换。当选择了项，特定的值被存储在一个特定的全局变量（如由确定-onvalue和-variable有关条目的选项）;当取消选择该条目时，另一个值（由-offvalue选项确定）存储在全局变量中。在复选框按钮的标签左侧显示一个指示框。如果选择了该条目，那么指示器的中心将以该条目的-selectcolor选项指定的颜色显示；否则，指示器的中心将以菜单的背景色显示。如果- 命令为checkbutton条目指定了option，然后每次调用该条目时，将其值作为Tcl命令评估；在切换条目的选择状态后会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: A class can be deleted using the "delete class" command. Individual objects can be deleted using the "delete object" command.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用“ delete class ”命令删除一个类。可以使用“ delete object ”命令删除单个对象。

trans-unit.source: A class can only be defined once, although the bodies of class methods and procs can be defined again and again for interactive debugging. See the body and configbody commands for details.
trans-unit.target: 一个类只能定义一次，尽管可以为交互式调试一次又一次地定义类方法和proc的主体。有关详细信息，请参见body和configbody命令。

trans-unit.source: A command is evaluated in two steps. First, the Tcl interpreter breaks the command into
trans-unit.target: 一条命令的评估分两步进行。首先,Tcl解释器将命令分解为

trans-unit.source: A command prefix, used to communicate with horizontal scrollbars. When the view in the widget's window changes, the widget will generate a Tcl command by concatenating the scroll command and two numbers. Each of the numbers is a fraction between 0 and 1 indicating a position in the document; 0 indicates the beginning, and 1 indicates the end. The first fraction indicates the first information in the widget that is visible in the window, and the second fraction indicates the information just after the last portion that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 一个命令前缀,用于与水平滚动条通信。当小组件窗口中的视图发生变化时,小组件将通过连接滚动命令和两个数字来生成一个Tcl命令,每个数字是0和1之间的分数,表示在文档中的位置;0表示开始,1表示结束。每一个数字都是0和1之间的分数,表示在文档中的一个位置;0表示开始,1表示结束。第一个分数表示小组件中在窗口中可见的第一个信息,第二个分数表示最后可见部分之后的信息。

trans-unit.source: A command prefix, used to communicate with vertical scrollbars. See the description of -xscrollcommand above for details.
trans-unit.target: 命令前缀，用于与垂直滚动条进行通信。有关详细信息，请参见上面的-xscrollcommand的描述。

trans-unit.source: A command that will wait for some time delay by waiting for a namespace variable to be set. Includes an interlock to prevent nested waits.
trans-unit.target: 通过等待命名空间变量的设置,等待一段时间延迟的命令。包括一个防止嵌套等待的联锁。

trans-unit.source: A consequence of this is that any use of a slot's default operation where the first member argument begins with a hyphen will be an error. One of the above operations should be used explicitly in those circumstances.
trans-unit.target: 这样做的一个后果是,任何使用槽的默认操作,如果第一个成员参数以连字符开头,都会出现错误。在这种情况下,应该明确地使用上述操作之一。

trans-unit.source: A constraint escape (AREs only) is a constraint, matching the empty string if specific conditions are met, written as an escape:
trans-unit.target: 约束转义(仅ARES)是一个约束,如果满足特定的条件,则匹配空字符串,写成转义。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the Content-Encoding meta-data value.
A copy of the Content-Length meta-data value.
A copy of the Content-Type meta-data value.

A database that does not implement one of these isolation levels will instead use the next more restrictive isolation level. If the given level of isolation cannot be obtained, the database interface throws an error reporting the fact. The default isolation level is readcommitted.
trans-unit.target: 未实现这些隔离级别之一的数据库将改用下一个更具限制性的隔离级别。如果无法获得给定的隔离级别，则数据库接口将引发错误以报告事实。默认隔离级别为readcommitted。

trans-unit.source: A decimal number giving the position of the desired character within the text item. 0 refers to the first character, 1 to the next character, and so on. If indexes are odd for lines and polygons, they will be automatically decremented by one. A number less than 0 is treated as if it were zero, and a number greater than the length of the text item is treated as if it were equal to the length of the text item. For polygons, numbers less than 0 or greater than the length of the coordinate list will be adjusted by adding or subtracting the length until the result is between zero and the length, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 小数点后的数字,表示所需字符在文本项中的位置,0表示第一个字符,1表示下一个字符,以此类推。0表示第一个字符,1表示下一个字符,以此类推。如果线和多边形的索引是奇数,它们将自动递减1。小于0的数字将被视为0,大于文本项长度的数字将被视为等于文本项的长度。对于多边形,小于0或大于坐标表长度的数字将通过加减长度来调整,直到结果介于0和长度之间,包括。

trans-unit.source: A different way of describing this behaviour is that file based locations are tracked as deeply as possible, and where this is not possible the lines are counted based on the smallest possible eval or procedure body, as that scope is usually easier to find than any dynamic outer scope.
trans-unit.target: 描述此行为的另一种方式是，尽可能深入地跟踪基于文件的位置，并且在不可能的情况下，基于最小的eval或过程主体对行进行计数，因为通常比任何动态方法更容易找到该范围外部范围。

trans-unit.source: A extendedclass can be deleted using the "delete extendedclass" command. Individual objects can be deleted using the "delete object" command.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用“ deleteextendedclass ”命令删除扩展类。可以使用“ delete object ”命令删除单个对象。

trans-unit.source: A extendedclass can only be defined once, although the bodies of extendedclass methods and procs can be defined again and again for interactive debugging. See the body and configbody commands for details.
trans-unit.target: 扩展类只能定义一次，尽管可以为交互式调试一次又一次地定义扩展类方法和proc的主体。有关详细信息，请参见body和configbody命令。

trans-unit.source: A file event handler is a binding between a channel and a script, such that the script is evaluated whenever the channel becomes readable or writable. File event handlers are most commonly used to allow data to be received from another process on an event-driven basis, so that the receiver can continue to interact with the user or with other channels while waiting for the data to arrive. If an application invokes chan gets or chan read on a blocking channel when there is no input data available, the process will block; until the input data arrives, it will not be able to service other events, so it will appear to the user to “freeze up”. With chan event, the process can tell when data is present and only invoke chan gets or chan read when they will not block.
trans-unit.target: 文件事件处理程序是通道和脚本之间的绑定，因此只要通道变得可读或可写，就对脚本进行评估。文件事件处理程序最常用于在事件驱动的基础上允许从另一个进程接收数据，以便接收器可以在等待数据到达的同时继续与用户或其他通道进行交互。如果在没有可用输入数据的情况下，应用程序在阻塞通道上调用chan gets或chan读取，则该过程将阻塞；否则，进程将阻塞。在输入数据到达之前，它将无法处理其他事件，因此用户将看到它“冻结”。使用chan事件，该进程可以判断何时存在数据，并且仅调用chan gets或chan阅读时，他们不会阻止。

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size window that says that it is fixed-size too:
trans-unit.target: 一个固定尺寸的窗口,说它也是固定尺寸的。

trans-unit.source: A floating point number specifying the maximum -value. Defaults to 100.
trans-unit.target: 浮点数指定最大-值。默认为100。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value corresponding to the highest value for the spinbox, to be used in conjunction with -from and -increment. When all are specified correctly, the spinbox will use these values to control its contents. This value must be greater than the -from option. If -values is specified, it supersedes this option.
trans-unit.target: 对应于Spinbox最大值的浮点值，将与-from和-increment结合使用。正确指定所有内容后，旋转框将使用这些值来控制其内容。此值必须大于-from选项。如果指定了-values，它将取代该选项。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value corresponding to the lowest value for a spinbox, to be used in conjunction with -to and -increment. When all are specified correctly, the spinbox will use these values to control its contents. This value must be less than the -to option. If -values is specified, it supersedes this option.
trans-unit.target: 对应于旋转框最低值的浮点值，将与-to和-increment结合使用。正确指定所有内容后，旋转框将使用这些值来控制其内容。此值必须小于-to选项。如果指定了-values，它将取代该选项。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value specifying the change in value to be applied each time one of the widget spin buttons is pressed. The up button applies a positive increment, the down button applies a negative increment.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点值,指定每次按下某个小组件旋转按钮时的数值变化。向上按钮为正增量,向下按钮为负增量。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value specifying the highest permissible value for the widget. See also -from and -increment. range.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点值，指定小部件的最高允许值。另请参见-from和-increment。范围。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value specifying the increment. When used with -from and -to, the value in the widget will be adjusted by -increment when a spin button is pressed (up adds the value, down subtracts the value).
trans-unit.target: 指定增量的浮点值。与-from和-to一起使用时，在按下旋转按钮时，小部件中的值将通过-increment进行调整（向上添加该值，向下减去该值）。

trans-unit.source: A floating-point value specifying the lowest value for the spinbox. This is used in conjunction with -to and -increment to set a numerical range.
trans-unit.target: 一个浮点值，指定旋转框的最小值。与-to和-increment结合使用以设置数值范围。

trans-unit.source: A frame is a simple widget. Its primary purpose is to act as a spacer or container for complex window layouts. The only features of a frame are its background color and an optional 3-D border to make the frame appear raised or sunken.
trans-unit.target: 框架是一个简单的小部件,它的主要目的是作为复杂窗口布局的间隔或容器。它的主要目的是作为复杂窗口布局的间隔或容器。框架的唯一特征是它的背景颜色和一个可选的三维边框,使框架看起来凸起或凹陷。

trans-unit.source: A generic unknown handler is used if set to the empty string. This consists in returning the key if no arguments are given. With given arguments, format is used to process the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为空字符串,则使用一个通用的未知处理程序。如果没有给定参数,则返回键。对于给定的参数,使用format来处理参数。

trans-unit.source: A keyed list is a list in which each element contains a key and value pair . These element pairs are stored as lists themselves, where the key is the first element of the list, and the value is the second . The key-value pairs are referred to as fields . This is an example of a keyed list:
trans-unit.target: 键控列表是一个列表,其中每个元素包含一个键和值对。这些元素对被存储为列表本身,其中键是列表的第一个元素,值是第二个元素。键值对被称为字段。这是一个键值列表的例子。

trans-unit.source: A label is a widget that displays a textual string, bitmap or image. If text is displayed, it must all be in a single font, but it can occupy multiple lines on the screen (if it contains newlines or if wrapping occurs because of the -wraplength option) and one of the characters may optionally be underlined using the -underline option. The label can be manipulated in a few simple ways, such as changing its relief or text, using the commands described below.
trans-unit.target: 标签是显示文本字符串，位图或图像的小部件。如果显示了文本，则必须全部使用一种字体，但是它可以在屏幕上占据多行（如果包含换行符，或者由于-wraplength选项而导致换行），并且可以选择使用其中一个字符加下划线-下划线选项。可以使用下面描述的命令以几种简单的方式来操作标签，例如更改其浮雕或文字。

trans-unit.source: A labelframe is a simple widget. Its primary purpose is to act as a spacer or container for complex window layouts. It has the features of a frame plus the ability to display a label.
trans-unit.target: 标签框是一个简单的小部件。它的主要目的是充当复杂窗口布局的间隔物或容器。它具有框架的功能以及显示标签的功能。

trans-unit.source: A leading BOM (Byte order mark) contained in the file is ignored for unicode encodings (utf-8, unicode).
trans-unit.target: 对于unicode编码(utf-8,unicode),文件中包含的前导BOM(字节顺序标记)会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A list containing zero or more of the following values, specifying which elements of the tree to display.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含0个或多个以下值的列表,指定要显示树的哪些元素。

trans-unit.source: A list of column identifiers (either symbolic names or integer indices) specifying which data columns are displayed and the order in which they appear, or the string #all. If set to #all (the default), all columns are shown in the order given.
trans-unit.target: 列标识符（符号名或整数索引）的列表，用于指定显示哪些数据列及其出现的顺序，或字符串#all。如果设置为#all（默认值），则所有列均以给定的顺序显示。

trans-unit.source: A list of column identifiers, specifying the number of columns and their names.
trans-unit.target: 列的标识符列表,指定列的数量和名称。

trans-unit.source: A list of paths, separated by either : (Unix) or ; (Windows). This is user and site specific as this environment variable can be set not only by the user's profile, but by system configuration scripts as well.

trans-unit.source: A list of tags associated with this item.
trans-unit.target: 与此项目相关的标签列表。

trans-unit.source: A listbox is a widget that displays a list of strings, one per line. When first created, a new listbox has no elements. Elements may be added or deleted using widget commands described below. In addition, one or more elements may be selected as described below. If a listbox is exporting its selection (see -exportselection option), then it will observe the standard X11 protocols for handling the selection. Listbox selections are available as type STRING; the value of the selection will be the text of the selected elements, with newlines separating the elements.
trans-unit.target: 列表框是一个显示字符串列表的小部件，每行一个。首次创建时，新的列表框没有任何元素。可以使用下面描述的小部件命令添加或删除元素。另外，可以如下所述选择一个或多个元件。如果列表框正在导出其选择（请参阅-exportselection选项），则它将遵循标准X11协议来处理选择。列表框选项可作为STRING类型使用；选择的值将是所选元素的文本，用换行符分隔元素。

trans-unit.source: A little GUI that displays what the keysym name of the last key pressed is:
trans-unit.target: 一个小GUI,可以显示最后一个被按下的键名是什么。

trans-unit.target: 一个地区可以提供其他地区。字符类不能作为一个范围的端点。

trans-unit.source: A localizable version of string toupper:

A lot of different errors may occur during serial read operations or during event polling in background. The external device may have been switched off, the data lines may be noisy, system buffers may overrun or your mode settings may be wrong. That is why a reliable software should always catch serial read operations. In cases of an error Tcl returns a general file I/O error. Then fconfigure-lasterror may help to locate the problem. The following error codes may be returned.
trans-unit.target: 在串行读取操作或后台事件轮询期间，可能会发生许多不同的错误。外部设备可能已关闭，数据线可能嘈杂，系统缓冲区可能超限或您的模式设置错误。这就是为什么可靠的软件应始终捕获串行读取操作的原因。如果发生错误，Tcl将返回常规文件I / O错误。然后，fconfigure -lasterror可能有助于查找问题。可能会返回以下错误代码。

trans-unit.source: A menu is a widget that displays a collection of one-line entries arranged in one or more columns. There exist several different types of entries, each with different properties. Entries of different types may be combined in a single menu. Menu entries are not the same as entry widgets. In fact, menu entries are not even distinct widgets; the entire menu is one widget.
trans-unit.target: 菜单是一个小组件,它显示一个或多个列中排列的单行条目的集合。有几种不同类型的条目,每一种都有不同的属性。不同类型的条目可以组合在一个菜单中。菜单条目与条目部件不同。事实上,菜单条目甚至不是不同的小组件;整个菜单是一个小组件。

trans-unit.source: A menubutton activates whenever the mouse passes over it and deactivates whenever the mouse leaves it.
trans-unit.target: 每当鼠标经过menubutton时,menubutton就会激活,每当鼠标离开menubutton时,menubutton就会停用。

trans-unit.source: A menubutton is a widget that displays a textual string, bitmap, or image and is associated with a menu widget. If text is displayed, it must all be in a single font, but it can occupy multiple lines on the screen (if it contains newlines or if wrapping occurs because of the -wraplength option) and one of the characters may optionally be underlined using the -underline option. In normal usage, pressing mouse button 1 over the menubutton causes the associated menu to be posted just underneath the menubutton. If the mouse is moved over the menu before releasing the mouse button, the button release causes the underlying menu entry to be invoked. When the button is released, the menu is unposted.
trans-unit.target: 菜单按钮是显示文本字符串，位图或图像的窗口小部件，并与菜单窗口小部件关联。如果显示了文本，则必须全部使用单一字体，但是它可以占据屏幕上的多行（如果包含换行符，或者由于-wraplength选项而导致换行），并且可以选择使用其中一个字符加下划线-下划线选项。在正常使用中，在菜单按钮上按下鼠标按钮1会使关联的菜单发布在菜单按钮的正下方。如果在释放鼠标按钮之前将鼠标移到菜单上，则释放按钮会导致调用基础菜单项。释放按钮后，菜单就不会发布。

trans-unit.source: A message is a widget that displays a textual string. A message widget has three special features that differentiate it from a label widget. First, it breaks up its string into lines in order to produce a given aspect ratio for the window. The line breaks are chosen at word boundaries wherever possible (if not even a single word would fit on a line, then the word will be split across lines). Newline characters in the string will force line breaks; they can be used, for example, to leave blank lines in the display.
trans-unit.target: 消息是显示文本字符串的小部件。消息小部件具有三个特殊功能，可将其与标签小部件区分开。首先，它将其字符串分成几行，以便为窗口生成给定的宽高比。尽可能在单词边界处选择换行符（如果单个单词不能连到一行，那么该单词将被分成几行）。字符串中的换行符将强制换行；例如，可以使用它们在显示屏中保留空白行。

trans-unit.source: A method cannot be both locally defined and delegated.
trans-unit.target: 一个方法不能既是本地定义的又是委托的。

trans-unit.target: 命名空间是命令和变量的集合。它封装了命令和变量,以确保它们不会干扰其他命名空间的命令和变量。Tcl一直有一个这样的集合,我们把它称为

trans-unit.source: A network server that does echoing of its input line-by-line without preventing servicing of other connections at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 一个网络服务器,可以逐行呼应它的输入,而不妨碍同时为其他连接提供服务。

trans-unit.source: A number of commands and variables in the ::tcltest namespace provided by earlier releases of tcltest have not been documented here. They are no longer part of the supported public interface of tcltest and should not be used in new test suites. However, to continue to support existing test suites written to the older interface specifications, many of those deprecated commands and variables still work as before. For example, in many circumstances, configure will be automatically called shortly after package requiretcltest 2.1 succeeds with arguments from the variable ::argv. This is to support test suites that depend on the old behavior that tcltest was automatically configured from command line arguments. New test files should not depend on this, but should explicitly include
trans-unit.target: 在一些命令和变量:: tcltest通过的早期版本中提供的命名空间tcltest没有被记录在这里。它们不再是tcltest支持的公共接口的一部分，并且不应在新的测试套件中使用。但是，为了继续支持编写为旧接口规范的现有测试套件，许多不推荐使用的命令和变量仍然像以前一样工作。例如，在许多情况下，配置将自动被调用后不久包装要求 tcltest 2.1从变量参数成功:: argv的。这是为了支持依赖于tcltest的旧行为的测试套件是从命令行参数自动配置的。新的测试文件不应依赖于此，而应明确包括

trans-unit.source: A number: if positive, it refers to the event with that number (all events are numbered starting at 1). If the number is negative, it selects an event relative to the current event (-1 refers to the previous event, -2 to the one before that, and so on). Event 0 refers to the current event.
trans-unit.target: 一个数字：如果为正，则表示具有该数字的事件（所有事件均从1开始编号）。如果数字为负，则选择相对于当前事件的事件（-1表示前一个事件，-2表示前一个事件，以此类推）。事件0是指当前事件。

trans-unit.source: A package may decide to register one or multiple callbacks, as described above.
trans-unit.target: 一个包可以决定注册一个或多个回调,如上所述。

trans-unit.source: A package using msgcat may choose to use its own package private locale and its own set of loaded locales, independent to the global locale set by ::msgcat::mclocale.
trans-unit.target: 使用msgcat的程序包可以选择使用自己的程序包私有语言环境和自己的已加载语言环境集，而与:: msgcat :: mclocale设置的全局语言环境无关。

trans-unit.source: A pane is resized by grabbing the sash (or sash handle if present) and dragging with the mouse. This is accomplished via mouse motion bindings on the widget. When a sash is moved, the sizes of the panes on each side of the sash, and thus the widgets in those panes, are adjusted.
trans-unit.target: 通过抓取窗格(或窗格手柄(如果存在))并使用鼠标拖动来调整窗格的大小。这是通过小组件上的鼠标运动绑定来实现的。当移动窗格时,窗格每一侧的窗格的大小,以及这些窗格中的小组件的大小都会被调整。

trans-unit.source: A panedwindow widget contains any number of panes, arranged horizontally or vertically, according to the value of the -orient option. Each pane contains one widget, and each pair of panes is separated by a moveable (via mouse movements) sash. Moving a sash causes the widgets on either side of the sash to be resized.
trans-unit.target: 根据-orient选项的值，窗格窗口小部件包含任意数量的水平或垂直排列的窗格。每个窗格包含一个小部件，每对窗格由可移动（通过鼠标移动）窗扇分隔。移动窗扇会导致窗扇两侧的小部件被调整大小。

trans-unit.source: A parity error has been detected by your UART. Wrong parity settings with fconfigure-mode or a noisy data line (RXD) may cause this error.
trans-unit.target: UART检测到奇偶校验错误。如果使用fconfigure -mode或奇偶校验数据线（RXD）设置的奇偶校验设置错误，可能会导致此错误。

trans-unit.source: A photo is an image whose pixels can display any color or be transparent. A photo image is stored internally in full color (32 bits per pixel), and is displayed using dithering if necessary. Image data for a photo image can be obtained from a file or a string, or it can be supplied from C code through a procedural interface. At present, only PNG, GIF and PPM/PGM formats are supported, but an interface exists to allow additional image file formats to be added easily. A photo image is transparent in regions where no image data has been supplied or where it has been set transparent by the transparency set subcommand.
trans-unit.target: 照片是像素可以显示任何颜色或透明的图像。照片图像以全彩（每个像素32位）内部存储，并在必要时使用抖动显示。照片图像的图像数据可以从文件或字符串中获取，也可以通过程序接口从C代码提供。目前，仅支持PNG，GIF和PPM / PGM格式，但是存在一个接口，可以轻松添加其他图像文件格式。照片图像在未提供图像数据或已通过透明度设置子命令将其设置为透明的区域中为透明。

trans-unit.source: A portion of the entry may be selected as described below. If an entry is exporting its selection (see the -exportselection option), then it will observe the standard X11 protocols for handling the selection; entry selections are available as type STRING. Entries also observe the standard Tk rules for dealing with the input focus. When an entry has the input focus it displays an
trans-unit.target: 可以如下所述选择条目的一部分。如果条目正在导出其选择（请参见-exportselection选项），则它将遵循标准X11协议来处理选择；条目选择的类型为STRING。条目还遵守用​​于处理输入焦点的标准Tk规则。当条目具有输入焦点时，它将显示一个

A priority order is defined among tags, and this order is used in implementing some of the tag-related functions described below. When a tag is defined (by associating it with characters or setting its display options or binding commands to it), it is given a priority higher than any existing tag. The priority order of tags may be redefined using the “
trans-unit.target: 在标签之间定义了优先级顺序，并且该顺序用于实现以下所述的一些与标签相关的功能。定义标签后（通过将其与字符相关联或设置其显示选项或将命令绑定到标签），该标签的优先级高于任何现有标签。标签的优先顺序可以使用“

trans-unit.source: A procedure to delete a given element from a list:
trans-unit.target: 从列表中删除某个元素的程序。

trans-unit.source: A properly formed list whose first element is the desired font
trans-unit.target: 一个正确形成的列表,其第一个元素是所需的字体。

trans-unit.source: A qualified interpreter name is a proper Tcl lists containing a subset of its ancestors in the interpreter hierarchy, terminated by the string naming the interpreter in its immediate master. Interpreter names are relative to the interpreter in which they are used. For example, if “a” is a slave of the current interpreter and it has a slave “a1”, which in turn has a slave “a11”, the qualified name of “a11” in “a” is the list “a1 a11”.
trans-unit.target: 合格的解释器名称是一个适当的Tcl列表，其中包含解释器层次结构中其祖先的子集，并以在其直接母版中为解释器命名的字符串终止。口译员名称是相对于使用它们的口译员的。例如，如果“ 一 ”是当前解释的奴隶，它有一个从“ A1 ”，这反过来有一个从“ A11 ”，“的限定名A11在”“ 一 ”是列表中的“ A1 A11 ”。

trans-unit.source: A radiobutton is a widget that displays a textual string, bitmap or image and a diamond or circle called an
trans-unit.target: 一个单选按钮是一个显示文本字符串、位图或图像的部件,以及一个称为 "单选按钮 "的菱形或圆形。

trans-unit.source: A radiobutton menu entry behaves much like a radiobutton widget. Radiobutton entries are organized in groups of which only one entry may be selected at a time. Whenever a particular entry becomes selected it stores a particular value into a particular global variable (as determined by the -value and -variable options for the entry). This action causes any previously-selected entry in the same group to deselect itself. Once an entry has become selected, any change to the entry's associated variable will cause the entry to deselect itself. Grouping of radiobutton entries is determined by their associated variables: if two entries have the same associated variable then they are in the same group. An indicator diamond is displayed to the left of the label in each radiobutton entry. If the entry is selected then the indicator's center is displayed in the color given by the -selectcolor option for the entry; otherwise the indicator's center is displayed in the background color for the menu. If a -command option is specified for a radiobutton entry, then its value is evaluated as a Tcl command each time the entry is invoked; this happens after selecting the entry.
trans-unit.target: 单选按钮菜单项的行为很像单选按钮小部件。单选按钮条目按组组织，一次只能选择一个条目。每当选择特定条目时，它将特定值存储到特定全局变量中（由-value和-variable确定）条目的选项）。此操作使同一组中的所有先前选择的条目都自行取消选择。一旦选择了一个条目，对该条目关联变量的任何更改都将导致该条目自身取消选择。单选按钮条目的分组由它们的关联变量确定：如果两个条目具有相同的关联变量，则它们在同一组中。在每个单选按钮条目的标签左侧显示一个指示器菱形。如果选择了该条目，那么指示器的中心将以该条目的-selectcolor选项指定的颜色显示；否则，指示器的中心将以菜单的背景色显示。如果- 命令为单选按钮条目指定了option，然后每次调用该条目时，将其值评估为Tcl命令；选择条目后会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: A real value corresponding to the left or top end of the scale.
trans-unit.target: 对应于标尺左端或上端的实际值。

trans-unit.source: A real value specifying the resolution for the scale. If this value is greater than zero then the scale's value will always be rounded to an even multiple of this value, as will tick marks and the endpoints of the scale. If the value is less than zero then no rounding occurs. Defaults to 1 (i.e., the value will be integral).
trans-unit.target: 一个实际值,指定刻度尺的分辨率。如果该值大于零,那么刻度尺的值将始终被四舍五入到该值的偶数倍,刻度尺的刻度线和端点也是如此。如果该值小于零,则不会发生四舍五入。默认值为1(即,值将是积分)。

trans-unit.source: A safe interpreter is created by specifying the -safe switch to the interp create command. Furthermore, any slave created by a safe interpreter will also be safe.
trans-unit.target: 通过将-safe开关指定给interp create命令来创建安全的解释器。此外，由安全解释器创建的任何从属也将是安全的。

trans-unit.source: A safe interpreter is created with exactly the following set of built-in commands:
trans-unit.target: 一个安全的解释器正是用以下一组内置命令创建的。

trans-unit.source: A safe interpreter is one with restricted functionality, so that is safe to execute an arbitrary script from your worst enemy without fear of that script damaging the enclosing application or the rest of your computing environment. In order to make an interpreter safe, certain commands and variables are removed from the interpreter. For example, commands to create files on disk are removed, and the exec command is removed, since it could be used to cause damage through subprocesses. Limited access to these facilities can be provided, by creating aliases to the master interpreter which check their arguments carefully and provide restricted access to a safe subset of facilities. For example, file creation might be allowed in a particular subdirectory and subprocess invocation might be allowed for a carefully selected and fixed set of programs.
trans-unit.target: 安全的解释器是功能受限的解释器，因此可以安全地执行来自最恶劣敌人的任意脚本，而不必担心该脚本会损坏封闭的应用程序或其他计算环境。为了使解释器安全，已从解释器中删除了某些命令和变量。例如，删除了在磁盘上创建文件的命令，并且执行该命令已删除，因为它可能被用来通过子进程造成损坏。通过为主解释器创建别名可以提供对这些设施的有限访问，这些别名会仔细检查其参数并提供对设施的安全子集的受限访问。例如，可能允许在特定的子目录中创建文件，并且可能允许对经过精心选择和固定的一组程序进行子进程调用。

trans-unit.source: A safe interpreter may not alter the recursion limit of any interpreter, including itself.
trans-unit.target: 一个安全的解释器不得改变任何解释器的递归限制,包括它自己。

trans-unit.source: A scale is a widget that displays a rectangular
trans-unit.target: 比例尺是一个显示长方形的小部件。

trans-unit.source: A script should not the isolation level when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 当一个事务正在进行时,一个脚本不应该是隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: A script template to evaluate whenever the -validatecommand returns 0. See VALIDATION below for more information.
trans-unit.target: 每当-validate命令返回0 时要评估的脚本模板。有关更多信息，请参见下面的VALIDATION。

trans-unit.source: A script template to evaluate whenever validation is triggered. If set to the empty string (the default), validation is disabled. The script must return a boolean value. See VALIDATION below.
trans-unit.target: 用于触发验证的脚本模板。如果设置为空字符串（默认值），则禁用验证。脚本必须返回布尔值。请参阅下面的“ 验证”。

trans-unit.source: A script to evaluate when the heading label is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 当标题标签被按下时评估的脚本。

trans-unit.source: A script to evaluate when the widget is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 当小组件被调用时要评估的脚本。

trans-unit.target: 滚动条显示五个元素,这些元素在滚动条的小组件命令中被提及。

trans-unit.target: 滚动条是一个显示两个箭头的小组件,一个在滚动条的两端,另一个在滚动条的两端。

trans-unit.source: A second reason for having a master different than the slave's parent is to tie two siblings together. For example, the placer can be used to force a window always to be positioned centered just below one of its siblings by specifying the configuration
trans-unit.target: 将主窗口与从窗口的父窗口不同的第二个原因是将两个兄弟姐妹捆绑在一起。例如,通过指定配置,可以使用 placer 强制将一个窗口总是定位在其兄弟姐妹之一的下方居中。

trans-unit.source: A semicolon that separates two SQL statements.
A separator is an entry that is displayed as a horizontal dividing line. A separator may not be activated or invoked, and it has no behavior other than its display appearance.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符是一个显示为水平分界线的条目。分隔线不能被激活或调用,它除了显示外观外没有其他行为。

trans-unit.target: 一个简单的对话式窗口,以屏幕为中心。

trans-unit.target: 处理形式为“ -foo 1 -bar 2”的命令行参数的一种简单但不是很可靠的方法是将它们加载到首先以默认设置加载的数组中：

trans-unit.source: A single character is read in and its Unicode value is stored in the variable as an integer value. Initial white space is not skipped in this case, so the input substring may be a white-space character.
trans-unit.target: 单个字符被读入,其Unicode值作为一个整数值存储在变量中。在这种情况下,初始的空白不会被跳过,所以输入的子串可能是一个空白字符。

trans-unit.source: A single space character replaces the backslash, newline, and all spaces and tabs after the newline. This backslash sequence is unique in that it is replaced in a separate pre-pass before the command is actually parsed. This means that it will be replaced even when it occurs between braces, and the resulting space will be treated as a word separator if it is not in braces or quotes.
trans-unit.target: 一个空格字符取代了反斜杠、换行和换行后的所有空格和制表符。这个反斜杠序列是独一无二的,因为它在命令实际被解析之前会被单独的预通替换。这意味着,即使它出现在大括号之间,也会被替换,而且如果它不在大括号或引号中,产生的空格将被视为单词分隔符。

trans-unit.source: A single-argument close on an already half-closed bidirectional channel is defined to just “finish the job”. A half-close on an already closed half, or on a wrong-sided unidirectional channel, raises an error.
trans-unit.target: 在已经半关闭的双向通道上，单参数关闭被定义为仅“完成任务”。在已经关闭的一半或错误的单向通道上的一半关闭会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: A specific month and day with optional year. The acceptable formats are “mm/dd?/yy?”, “monthname dd?, yy?”, “day, dd monthname ?yy?”, “dd monthname yy”, “?CC?yymmdd”, and “dd-monthname-?CC?yy”. The default year is the current year. If the year is less than 100, we treat the years 00-68 as 2000-2068 and the years 69-99 as 1969-1999. Not all platforms can represent the years 38-70, so an error may result if these years are used.
trans-unit.target: 特定的月份和日期以及可选的年份。可接受的格式是“ mm / dd？/ yy？”，“ monthname dd？，是吗？”，“ 日，dd月名？yy？”，“ dd monthname yy ”，“？CC？yymmdd ”和“ dd-monthname-？” 。CC？yy ”。默认年份为当前年份。如果年份少于100，我们将00-68年视为2000-2068，将69-99年视为1969-1999。并非所有平台都可以代表38-70年，因此如果使用这些年可能会导致错误。

trans-unit.source: A specification relative to the current time. The format is number unit. Acceptable units are year, fortnight, month, week, day, hour, minute (or min), and second (or sec). The unit can be specified as a singular or plural, as in 3 weeks. These modifiers may also be specified: tomorrow, yesterday, today, now, last, this, next, ago.
trans-unit.target: 相对于当前时间的规范。格式为数字单位。可接受的单位是年，两周，一个月，一周，一天，小时，分钟（或分）和第二（或秒）。单位可以指定为单数或复数，如3周之内。还可以指定这些修饰符：明天，昨天，今天，现在，最后，这个，下一个，以前。

trans-unit.source: A stop-bit error has been detected by your UART. Wrong mode settings with fconfigure-mode or a noisy data line (RXD) may cause this error.
trans-unit.target: UART检测到停止位错误。如果使用fconfigure -mode或错误的数据线（RXD）设置错误的模式，则可能导致此错误。

trans-unit.source: A string to display as a label for the scale. For vertical scales the label is displayed just to the right of the top end of the scale. For horizontal scales the label is displayed just above the left end of the scale. If the option is specified as an empty string, no label is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 作为刻度尺的标签显示的字符串。对于垂直标尺,标签显示在标尺上端的右侧。对于水平标尺,标签显示在标尺左端的上方;如果指定为空字符串,则不显示标签。如果指定的选项为空字符串,则不显示标签。

trans-unit.source: A string: selects the most recent event that matches the string. An event is considered to match the string either if the string is the same as the first characters of the event, or if the string matches the event in the sense of the string match command.
trans-unit.target: 字符串：选择与字符串匹配的最新事件。如果字符串与事件的前几个字符相同，或者从字符串match命令的意义上说，该字符串与事件匹配，则认为该事件与该字符串匹配。

trans-unit.source: A suitable version of the package is any version which satisfies at least one of the requirements, per the rules of package vsatisfies. If multiple versions are suitable the implementation with the highest version is chosen. This last part is additionally influenced by the selection mode set with package prefer.
trans-unit.target: 软件包的合适版本是根据软件包vsatisfies的规则满足至少一项要求的任何版本。如果多个版本合适，则选择具有最高版本的实现。这最后一部分还受包preferred设置的选择模式的影响。

trans-unit.source: A symbolic name from the list of -columns.

A tear-off entry appears at the top of the menu if enabled with the -tearoff option. It is not like other menu entries in that it cannot be created with the add widget command and cannot be deleted with the delete widget command. When a tear-off entry is created it appears as a dashed line at the top of the menu. Under the default bindings, invoking the tear-off entry causes a torn-off copy to be made of the menu and all of its submenus.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用-tearoff选项启用，则会在菜单顶部显示一个撕下条目。它与其他菜单项不同，它不能使用add widget命令创建，也不能使用delete widget命令删除。创建撕下条目后，它会在菜单顶部以虚线显示。在默认绑定下，调用撕下条目将导致菜单及其所有子菜单被撕下。

trans-unit.source: A test file should also be able to be evaluated directly as a script, not depending on being called by a master runAllTests. This means that each test file should process command line arguments to give the tester all the configuration control that tcltest provides.
trans-unit.target: 测试文件还应该能够直接作为脚本进行评估，而不必依赖于主runAllTests调用。这意味着每个测试文件都应处理命令行参数，以向测试人员提供tcltest提供的所有配置控制。

trans-unit.source: A test file should be able to be combined with other test files and not interfere with them, even when configure -singleproc 1 causes all files to be evaluated in a common interpreter. A simple way to achieve this is to have your tests define all their commands and variables in a namespace that is deleted when the test file evaluation is complete. A good namespace to use is a child namespace test of the namespace of the module you are testing.
trans-unit.target: 一个测试文件应该能够与其他测试文件合并，并且不会干扰它们，即使configure -singleproc 1导致所有文件都在一个通用解释器中求值。一种简单的方法是让您的测试在命名空间中定义其所有命令和变量，并在完成测试文件评估后删除该命名空间。一个好的名称空间是要测试的模块的名称空间的子名称空间测试。

trans-unit.source: A text item displays a string of characters on the screen in one or more lines. Text items are created with widget commands of the following form:

trans-unit.source: A text widget displays one or more lines of text and allows that text to be edited. Text widgets support four different kinds of annotations on the text, called tags, marks, embedded windows or embedded images. Tags allow different portions of the text to be displayed with different fonts and colors. In addition, Tcl commands can be associated with tags so that scripts are invoked when particular actions such as keystrokes and mouse button presses occur in particular ranges of the text. See TAGS below for more details.
trans-unit.target: 文本小部件显示一行或多行文本，并允许对该文本进行编辑。文本小部件支持在文本上的四种不同类型的注释，称为标记，标记，嵌入式窗口或嵌入式图像。标签允许以不同的字体和颜色显示文本的不同部分。另外，Tcl命令可以与标签关联，以便在文本的特定范围内发生诸如按键和鼠标按键按下之类的特定动作时调用脚本。有关更多详细信息，请参见下面的标签。

trans-unit.source: A thing of note is that for procedures statically defined in files the locations of commands in their bodies will be reported with type source and absolute line numbers, and not as type proc. The same is true for procedures nested in statically defined procedures, and literal eval scripts in files or statically defined procedures.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是，对于在文件中静态定义的过程，命令在其主体中的位置将使用source和绝对行号类型而不是proc类型来报告。对于嵌套在静态定义的过程中的过程，文件或静态定义的过程中的文字评估脚本也是如此。

trans-unit.source: A thread pool offers a solution to both the problem of thread life-cycle overhead and the problem of resource trashing . By reusing threads for multiple tasks, the thread-creation overhead is spread over many tasks . As a bonus, because the thread already exists when a request arrives, the delay introduced by thread creation is eliminated . Thus, the request can be serviced immediately . Furthermore, by properly tuning the number of threads in the thread pool, resource thrashing may also be eliminated by forcing any request to wait until a thread is available to process it .
trans-unit.target: 线程池为线程生命周期开销和资源浪费问题提供了一个解决方案。通过为多个任务重用线程,线程创建的开销被分摊到许多任务中。作为一个额外的好处,因为当一个请求到达时,线程已经存在,所以消除了线程创建所带来的延迟。因此,请求可以立即得到服务。此外,通过适当地调整线程池中的线程数量,也可以通过强制任何请求等待,直到有线程可用来处理它来消除资源打乱。

trans-unit.source: A time of day, which is of the form: hh?:mm?:ss?? ?meridian? ?zone? or hhmm ?meridian? ?zone? If no meridian is specified, hh is interpreted on a 24-hour clock.

trans-unit.source: A toplevel is similar to a frame except that it is created as a top-level window: its X parent is the root window of a screen rather than the logical parent from its path name. The primary purpose of a toplevel is to serve as a container for dialog boxes and other collections of widgets. The only visible features of a toplevel are its background color and an optional 3-D border to make the toplevel appear raised or sunken.
trans-unit.target: 一个toplevel类似于框架,除了它是作为一个顶层窗口创建的:它的X父级是屏幕的根窗口,而不是路径名中的逻辑父级。toplevel的主要目的是作为对话框和其他部件集合的容器。toplevel唯一可见的特征是它的背景色和一个可选的三维边框,以使toplevel看起来凸起或凹陷。

trans-unit.source: After computing the next window, tk_focusNext examines the window's -takefocus option to see whether it should be skipped. If so, tk_focusNext continues on to the next window in the focus order, until it eventually finds a window that will accept the focus or returns back to
trans-unit.target: 在计算了下一个窗口之后，tk_focusNext检查该窗口的-takefocus选项以查看是否应跳过该窗口。如果是这样，则tk_focusNext继续按焦点顺序进入下一个窗口，直到最终找到一个接受焦点的窗口或返回到

trans-unit.source: After creating a dialog box, tk_dialog waits for the user to select one of the buttons either by clicking on the button with the mouse or by typing return to invoke the default button (if any). Then it returns the index of the selected button: 0 for the leftmost button, 1 for the button next to it, and so on. If the dialog's window is destroyed before the user selects one of the buttons, then -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 创建对话框后，tk_dialog等待用户选择其中一个按钮，方法是用鼠标单击该按钮或键入return调用默认按钮（如果有）。然后，它返回所选按钮的索引：0表示最左边的按钮，1表示旁边的按钮，依此类推。如果在用户选择按钮之一之前对话框的窗口已被破坏，则返回-1。

trans-unit.source: After evaluating all selected test files, a summary of the results is printed to outputChannel. The summary includes the total number of tests evaluated, broken down into those skipped, those passed, and those failed. The summary also notes the number of files evaluated, and the names of any files with failing tests or errors. A list of the constraints that caused tests to be skipped, and the number of tests skipped for each is also printed. Also, messages are printed if it appears that evaluation of a test file has caused any temporary files to be left behind in configure -tmpdir.
trans-unit.target: 在评估所有选定的测试文件之后，结果摘要将打印到outputChannel。摘要包括评估的测试总数，细分为跳过的测试，通过的测试和失败的测试。该摘要还记录了评估的文件数量，以及测试失败或错误的任何文件的名称。还会列出导致跳过测试的约束条件列表，以及每个测试跳过的测试数量。另外，如果似乎评估测试文件已导致在configure -tmpdir中遗留下任何临时文件，则会打印消息。

trans-unit.source: After modifying all the widgets in the application, tk_setPalette adds options to the option database to change the defaults for widgets created in the future. trans-unit.target: 不论它们的相对路径名如何，所有顶级窗口都可以相对于彼此进行重新堆叠，但是窗口管理器没有义务严格遵守重新堆叠的请求。

trans-unit.source: All Tcl commands and C procedures that take file names as arguments expect the file names to be in one of three forms, depending on the current platform. On each platform, Tcl supports file names in the standard forms(s) for that platform. In addition, on all platforms, Tcl supports a Unix-like syntax intended to provide a convenient way of constructing simple file names. However, scripts that are intended to be portable should not assume a particular form for file names. Instead, portable scripts must use the file split and file join commands to manipulate file names (see the file manual entry for more details).
trans-unit.target: 所有以文件名作为参数的Tcl命令和C过程都希望文件名采用以下三种形式之一，具体取决于当前平台。在每个平台上，Tcl支持该平台的标准格式的文件名。此外，在所有平台上，Tcl支持类似Unix的语法，旨在提供一种构造简单文件名的便捷方法。但是，旨在可移植的脚本不应采用文件名的特定形式。而是，可移植脚本必须使用文件拆分和文件联接命令来操作文件名（有关更多详细信息，请参见文件手册条目）。

trans-unit.source: All commands provided in the master interpreter by Safe Tcl reside in the safe namespace.
trans-unit.target: Safe Tcl在主解释器中提供的所有命令均位于安全名称空间中。

trans-unit.source: All coordinates related to canvases are stored as floating-point numbers. Coordinates and distances are specified in screen units, which are floating-point numbers optionally followed by one of several letters. If no letter is supplied then the distance is in pixels. If the letter is m then the distance is in millimeters on the screen; if it is c then the distance is in centimeters; i means inches, and p means printers points (1/72 inch). Larger y-coordinates refer to points lower on the screen; larger x-coordinates refer to points farther to the right. Coordinates can be specified either as an even number of parameters, or as a single list parameter containing an even number of x and y coordinate values.
trans-unit.target: 与画布相关的所有坐标都存储为浮点数。坐标和距离以屏幕单位指定，它们是浮点数，可以选择后面跟几个字母之一。如果未提供字母，则距离以像素为单位。如果字母是m，则屏幕上的距离以毫米为单位；如果是c，则距离以厘米为单位；i表示英寸，p表示打印机点（1/72英寸）。较大的y坐标是指屏幕上较低的点；较大的x坐标是指更右侧的点。可以将坐标指定为偶数个参数，也可以指定为包含x和y坐标值的偶数的单个列表参数。

trans-unit.source: All data and markup is shared, except for a few small details. First, the sel tag may be set and configured (in its display style) differently for each peer. Second, each peer has its own insert and current mark positions (but all other marks are shared). Third, embedded windows, which are arbitrary other widgets, cannot be shared between peers. This means the -window option of embedded windows is independently set for each peer (it is advisable to use the -create script capabilities to allow each peer to create its own embedded windows as needed). Fourth, all of the configuration options of each peer (e.g. -font, etc) can be set independently, with the exception of -undo, -maxundo, -autoseparators (i.e. all undo, redo and modified state issues are shared).
trans-unit.target: 除了一些小细节，所有数据和标记都是共享的。首先，可以为每个对等方不同地设置和配置sel标签（以其显示样式）。其次，每个对等方都有其自己的插入位置和当前标记位置（但所有其他标记均共享）。第三，嵌入式窗口是任意其他窗口小部件，无法在同级之间共享。这意味着将为每个对等方独立设置嵌入式窗口的-window选项（建议使用-create脚本功能以允许每个对等方根据需要创建自己的嵌入式窗口）。第四，可以单独设置每个对等方的所有配置选项（例如-font等），-undo，-maxundo，-autoseparators（即，共享所有撤消，重做和修改后的状态问题）。

trans-unit.source: All internal computations involving floating-point are done with the C type
trans-unit.target: 所有涉及浮点数的内部计算都是通过C类型的

trans-unit.source: All internal computations involving integers are done calling on the LibTomMath multiple precision integer library as required so that all integer calculations are performed exactly. Note that in Tcl releases prior to 8.5, integer calculations were performed with one of the C types

trans-unit.source: Another Windows peculiarity is that any number of trailing dots “.” in filenames are totally ignored, so, for example, attempts to create a file or directory with a name “foo.” will result in the creation of a file/directory with name “foo”. This fact is reflected in the results of file normalize. Furthermore, a file name consisting only of dots “.........” or dots with trailing characters “.....abc” is illegal.
trans-unit.target: Windows的另一个特点是任意数量的尾随点“。” 文件名中的完全被忽略，因此，例如，尝试创建名称为“ foo”的文件或目录。将导致创建名称为“ foo”的文件/目录。这个事实反映在文件规范化的结果中。此外，仅由点“ ........”或带尾字符“ ... abc”的点组成的文件名是非法的。

trans-unit.source: Another error possibility is that ::http::geturl is unable to write all the post query data to the server before the server responds and closes the socket. The error message is saved in the posterror status array element and then ::http::geturl attempts to complete the transaction. If it can read the server's response it will end up with an ok status, otherwise it will have an eof status.
trans-unit.target: 另一个错误可能性是：:: http :: geturl在服务器响应并关闭套接字之前无法将所有后查询数据写入服务器。错误消息将保存在posterror状态数组元素中，然后:: http :: geturl尝试完成事务。如果它可以读取服务器的响应，则它将以ok状态结束，否则它将处于eof状态。

trans-unit.source: Another restriction is that it is not possible to post events that the I/O core has not registered an interest in. Trying to do so will cause the method to throw an error. trans-unit.source: As long as test is called with valid syntax and legal values for all attributes, it will not raise an error. Test failures are instead reported as output written to outputChannel. In default operation, a successful test produces no output. The output messages produced by test are controlled by the configure -verbose option as described in CONFIGURABLE OPTIONS below. Any output produced by the test scripts themselves should be produced using puts to outputChannel or errorChannel, so that users of the test suite may easily capture output with the configure -outfile and configure -errfile options, and so that the -output and -errorOutput attributes work properly.
trans-unit.target: 只要使用所有属性的有效语法和合法值调用测试，就不会引发错误。而是将测试失败报告为输出写入outputChannel。在默认操作中，成功的测试不会产生任何输出。测试产生的输出消息由configure -verbose选项控制，如下面的CONFIGURABLE OPTIONS中所述。测试脚本本身产生的任何输出都应使用puts到outputChannel或errorChannel产生，以便测试套件的用户可以使用configure -outfile和configure -errfile轻松捕获输出。选项，从而使-output和-errorOutput属性正常工作。

trans-unit.source: As mentioned above, namespace names are looked up differently than the names of variables and commands. Namespace names are always resolved in the current namespace. trans-unit.source: As only the Tcl level of a channel, i.e. its command handler, should post events to it we also restrict the usage of this command to the interpreter that created the channel. Attempting to post an event from any other interpreter will cause this subcommand to report an error.

trans-unit.source: As the input translation mode, auto treats any of newline (lf), carriage return (cr), or carriage return followed by a newline (crlf) as the end of line representation. The end of line representation can even change from line-to-line, and all cases are translated to a newline. As the output translation mode, auto chooses a platform specific representation; for sockets on all platforms Tcl chooses crlf, for all Unix flavors, it chooses lf, and for the various flavors of Windows it chooses crlf. The default setting for -translation is auto for both input and output.
trans-unit.target: 作为输入转换模式，auto将换行符（lf），回车符（cr）或回车符后跟换行符（crlf）中的任何一个视为行尾。行的表示形式甚至可以逐行更改，并且所有情况都转换为换行符。作为输出翻译模式，自动选择平台特定的表示形式；对于所有平台上的套接字，Tcl选择crlf，对于所有Unix版本，它选择lf，对于Windows的各种版本，它选择crlf。-translation的默认设置对于输入和输出都是自动的。

trans-unit.source: At the next higher layer of organization, several test commands are gathered together into a single test file. Test files should have names with the “.test” extension, because that is the default pattern used by runAllTests to find test files. It is a good rule of thumb to have one test file for each source code file of your project. It is good practice to edit the test file and the source code file together, keeping tests synchronized with code changes.
trans-unit.target: 在组织的下一个更高层，几个测试命令被收集到一个测试文件中。测试文件的名称应带有“ .test ”扩展名，因为这是runAllTests用于查找测试文件的默认模式。经验法则是，项目的每个源代码文件都有一个测试文件。优良作法是一起编辑测试文件和源代码文件，以使测试与代码更改保持同步。

trans-unit.source: BREs differ from EREs in several respects. “|”, “+”, and ? are ordinary characters and there is no equivalent for their functionality. The delimiters for bounds are \{ and “\}”, with { and } by themselves ordinary characters. The parentheses for nested subexpressions are \( and “\)”, with ( and ) by themselves ordinary characters. ^ is an ordinary character except at the beginning of the RE or the beginning of a parenthesized subexpression, $ is an ordinary character except at the end of the RE or the end of a parenthesized subexpression, and * is an ordinary character if it appears at the beginning of the RE or the beginning of a parenthesized subexpression (after a possible leading “^”). Finally, single-digit back references are available, and \< and \> are synonyms for “[[:<:]]” and “[[:>:]]” respectively; no other escapes are available.
trans-unit.target: BRE在几个方面与ERE不同。 “ | ”，“ + ”和？是普通字符，其功能没有等效之处。边界的分隔符是\ {和“ \} ”，其中{和}本身就是普通字符。嵌套子表达式的括号是\（和“ \） ”，其中（和）本身是普通字符。^是普通字符，除了RE的开头或带括号的子表达式的开头$是一个普通字符，除了RE的末尾或带括号的子表达式的末尾，*是一个普通字符，如果它出现在RE的开头或带括号的子表达式的开头（可能在前导“ ^ ”之后） 。最后，可以使用一位数字的反向引用，\ <和\>分别是“ [[ ::: ]] ”和“ [[ ::: ]] ”的同义词；没有其他逃生通道。

trans-unit.source: Because a master interpreter may invoke a hidden command as part of handling an alias invocation, great care must be taken to avoid evaluating any arguments passed in through the alias invocation. Otherwise, malicious slave interpreters could cause a trusted master interpreter to execute dangerous commands on their behalf. See the section on ALIAS INVOCATION for a more complete discussion of this topic. To help avoid this problem, no substitutions or evaluations are applied to arguments of interp invokehidden.
trans-unit.target: 因为主解释器可能会在处理别名调用的过程中调用隐藏的命令，所以必须格外小心，以避免评估通过别名调用传递的任何参数。否则，恶意的从属解释器可能会导致受信任的主解释器代表他们执行危险的命令。有关此主题的更完整讨论，请参见ALIAS INVOCATION一节。为了帮助避免此问题，不会对interp invokehidden的参数应用任何替换或求值。

trans-unit.source: Because some of these commands access the local file system, there is a potential for information leakage about its directory structure. To prevent this, commands that take file names as arguments in a safe interpreter use tokens instead of the real directory names. These tokens are translated to the real directory name while a request to, e.g., source a file is mediated by the master interpreter. This virtual path system is maintained in the master interpreter for each safe interpreter created by ::safe::interpCreate or initialized by ::safe::interpInit and the path maps tokens accessible in the safe interpreter into real path names on the local file system thus preventing safe interpreters from gaining knowledge about the structure of the file system of the host on which the interpreter is executing. The only valid file names arguments for the source and load aliases provided to the slave are path in the form of [file join
trans-unit.target: 因为其中一些命令访问本地文件系统，所以有关其目录结构的信息可能会泄漏。为了防止这种情况，在安全解释器中将文件名作为参数的命令使用令牌代替真实目录名。当主解释器介导对例如源文件的请求时，这些令牌被转换为真实目录名称。对于由:: safe :: interpCreate创建或由:: safe :: interpInit初始化的每个安全解释器，此虚拟路径系统均在主解释器中维护。路径将安全解释器中可访问的令牌映射为本地文件系统上的真实路径名，从而阻止安全解释器获得有关在其上执行解释器的主机文件系统结构的知识。提供给从属服务器的源别名和负载别名的唯一有效文件名参数是[file join]形式的路径。

trans-unit.source: Because the font selection dialog is application-global, in the presence of multiple interpreters calling tk fontchooser, only the -command callback set by the interpreter that most recently called tk fontchooserconfigure or tk fontchoosershow will be invoked in response to user action and only the -parent set by that interpreter will receive <<TkFontchooser*>> virtual events.
trans-unit.target: 因为字体选择对话框是应用程序全局的，所以在有多个解释器调用tk fontchooser的情况下，只有最近调用tk fontchooser configure或tk fontchooser show的解释器设置的-command回调将响应用户操作而被调用，并且仅该解释器设置的-parent将接收<< TkFontchooser * >>虚拟事件。

trans-unit.source: Before Tk 8.5, the widget used the string “chars” to refer to index positions (which included characters, embedded windows and embedded images). As of Tk 8.5 the text widget deals separately and correctly with “chars” and “indices”. For backwards compatibility, however, the index modifiers “+N chars” and “-N chars” continue to refer to indices. One must use any of the full forms “+N any chars” or “-N any chars” etc. to refer to actual character indices. This confusion may be fixed in a future release by making the widget correctly interpret “+N chars” as a synonym for “+N any chars”.
trans-unit.target: 在Tk 8.5之前，小部件使用字符串“ chars”来指代索引位置（包括字符，嵌入的窗口和嵌入的图像）。从Tk 8.5开始，文本小部件分别正确处理“字符”和“索引”。但是，为了向后兼容，索引修饰符“ + N个字符”和“ -N个字符”继续引用索引。必须使用“ + N任何字符”或“ -N任何字符”等任何完整形式来引用实际的字符索引。通过使窗口小部件正确地将“ + N个字符”解释为“ + N个任何字符”的同义词，可以在将来的版本中解决此混淆。

trans-unit.source: Before scanning begins, the format string is preprocessed to replace %c, %Ec, %x, %Ex, %X. %Ex, %r, %R, %T, %D, %EY and %+ format groups with counterparts that are appropriate to the current locale and contain none of the above groups. For instance, %D will (in the en_US locale) be replaced with %m/%d/%Y.
trans-unit.target: 在开始扫描之前，对格式字符串进行预处理以替换％c，％Ec，％x，％Ex，％X。％Ex，％r，％R，％T，％D，％EY和％+格式组，其对应于当前语言环境的对应组不包含上述任何组。例如，％D将（在en_US语言环境中）替换为％m /％d /％Y。

trans-unit.source: Boundaries (called “separators”) are inserted between edit actions. The purpose of these separators is to group inserts, deletes and replaces into one compound edit action. When undoing a change everything between two separators will be undone. The undone changes are then moved to the redo stack, so that an undone edit can be redone again. The redo stack is cleared whenever new edit actions are recorded on the undo stack. The undo and redo stacks can be cleared to keep their depth under control.
trans-unit.target: 在编辑动作之间插入了边界（称为“分隔符”）。这些分隔符的目的是将插入，删除和替换分组为一个复合编辑动作。撤消更改时，两个分隔符之间的所有内容都将被撤消。然后将撤消的更改移至重做堆栈，以便可以再次重做撤消的编辑。每当新的编辑操作记录在撤消堆栈上时，都会清除重做堆栈。可以清除撤消和重做堆栈，以控制其深度。

trans-unit.source: By default, each window has four binding tags consisting of the name of the window, the window's class name, the name of the window's nearest toplevel ancestor, and all, in that order. Toplevel windows have only three tags by default, since the toplevel name is the same as that of the window. The bindtags command allows the binding tags for a window to be read and modified.

trans-unit.source: C procedures are implemented just like ordinary Tcl commands. See the CrtCommand man page for details. Within the procedure, class data members can be accessed like ordinary variables using Tcl_SetVar(), Tcl_GetVar(), Tcl_TraceVar(), etc. Class methods and procs can be executed like ordinary commands using Tcl_Eval(). [incr Tcl] makes this possible by automatically setting up the context before executing the C procedure.
trans-unit.target: C过程的实现与普通的Tcl命令一样。有关详细信息，请参见CrtCommand手册页。在该过程中，可以使用Tcl_SetVar（），Tcl_GetVar（），Tcl_TraceVar（）等访问类数据成员，就像普通变量一样。可以使用Tcl_Eval（）像普通命令一样执行类方法和proc。[incr Tcl]通过在执行C过程之前自动设置上下文来实现这一点。

[incr Tcl] makes this possible by automatically setting up the context before executing the C procedure.

trans-unit.source: Callers should not expect a result from tk fontchoosershow and may not assume that the dialog has been withdrawn or closed when the command returns. All user interaction with the dialog is communicated to the caller via the -command callback and the <<TkFontchooser*>> virtual events. It is implementation dependent which exact user actions result in the callback being called resp. the virtual events being sent. Where an Apply or OK button is present in the dialog, that button will trigger the -command callback and <<TkFontchooserFontChanged>> virtual event. On some implementations other user actions may also have that effect; on Mac OS X for instance, the standard font selection dialog immediately reflects all user choices to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 调用者不应从tk fontchooser show中看到结果，也不能假定该命令返回时该对话框已撤回或关闭。与对话框的所有用户交互都通过-command回调和<< TkFontchooser * >>虚拟事件传递给调用者。依赖于实现的是，确切的用户操作导致回调称为resp。发送的虚拟事件。对话框中出现“应用”或“确定”按钮的情况下，该按钮将触发-command回调和<< TkFontchooserFontChanged >>虚拟事件。在某些实现方式上，其他用户操作也可能会产生这种效果。例如，在Mac OS X上，标准字体选择对话框立即将所有用户选择反映给呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: Care has to be taken when using mutexes in an multithreading program . Improper use of mutexes may lead to various deadlock situations, especially when using exclusive mutexes .

Causes the command to return, as a list, the data that would otherwise be placed in match variables. When using -inline, match variables may not be specified. If used with -all, the list will be concatenated at each iteration, such that a flat list is always returned. trans-unit.target: 使命令以列表形式返回原本将放置在匹配变量中的数据。使用-inline时，可能未指定匹配变量。如果与-all一起使用，则该列表将在每次迭代时连接在一起，以便始终返回平面列表。对于每个匹配迭代，该命令将附加总体匹配数据，并为正则表达式中的每个子表达式添加一个元素。例如：
